title: Extra Large 1BR in RINO Exposed Brick, Internet included, W/D on site
neighborhood: RiNo Ballpark Curtis Park Lodo Downtown
posting_body: ['Text only please.', 'Please mention "1BR Main RINO" in your response.', ' Use reply upper left of ad to get number to text.', 'Quiet, very large, private and secluded 1BR RiNo main floor apartment with private entrance in gated / secure and well lighted Victorian complex.', 'Close to Coors Field and Lodo and just steps to the heart of RiNo.', 'Shake Shack is literally around the corner.', 'Charming complex.', 'No big box feeling here.', 'NO Smoking on property whatsoever.', 'One Cat may be considered.', 'Sorry, No dogs.', '$1500 rent, one year lease, $1,000 deposit plus move in fee.', 'Available September 1.', 'This is a very large private apartment with great large living space and 1 bedroom with ample closet space', 'Gorgeous kitchen, AC', 'Additional space to be used for dining table, home office or maybe even your workout equipment', 'Unit walks out onto beautiful, relaxing court-yard with gas grill and patio set for grilling or just relaxing.', 'Quiet neighborhood setting', 'On-site coin-op laundry.', 'Includes trash, water, sewer, Hi-Speed Internet.', 'Tenant pays gas and electric.', 'Just two blocks from beautiful Curtis park Easy access to Downtown, Coors Field, Lodo, A-Line, Light Rail and all the area hospitals.', 'Shake Shack, Rye Society and all things on Larimer St. in hot River North (RiNo) Enjoy all the food trucks galore, restaurants, entertainment, coffee shops and bars or walk just 12 blocks to Coors Field.', "Near restaurants and entertainment in Rino district on Larimer (Shake Shack, Rye Society, Sushi Rama, Osaka Ramen, Denver Central Market, Fish N Beer, Infinite Monkey Theorem, Crema, Hop Alley, Snooze, Park Burger, Billy Dogs, Work n Class, Cart-Driver, The Walnut Room, Snarf's and many many more!)", "Close to Curtis Park, Downtown, Coors Field, Ballpark, Lodo,16th Street Mall, Rhino, Metro, Auraria, University of Colorado at Denver, - 80205 Coors Field, Metro, Metropolitan State University, Lodo, Rino, Rhino, Ballpark, lodo, Lodo, LODO, RINO, Rino, rino, Ballpark, BALLPARK, BallPark, Curtis Park, curtis park, CURTIS PARK, Curtis, curtis, CURTIS, obr, oBR, 1BR, 1br, 1Br, capitol hill, wash park, south broadway, highlands, the yards, Larimer, Lawrence, downtown, denver, uptown, Brighton Blvd easy commute to DIA, area hospitals Craig, St. Luke's, Saint Joseph's, Children's Hospital"]
